INSERT INTO MODI_R2CGL_CONFIG_col (CONFIGID, PAGEBYNAME, PAGEBYENAME, ENAME, CNAME, ORDERID) values ( #{configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pagebyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pagebyename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MODI_R2CGL_FUGITIVE (ID, FUGITIVENO, FUGITIVEID, FUGITIVENAME, ISARCHIVED, ) VALUES (modi_r2cgl_fugitive_seq.nextval,#{fugitiveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fugitiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fugitiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0' , )

INSERT INTO MODI_R2CGL_FUGITIVE_RSER (ID, FUGITIVEID, RELATIONSHIP, RELATIONSHIPERID, TRAILDESC, TRAILTYPE, TRAILTIME, LAT, LON) VALUES (MODI_R2CGL_FUGITIVE_RSER_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{fugitiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{relationShip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{relationShiperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{trailDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trailType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trailTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, )
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "id", FUGITIVEID AS "fugitiveId", RELATIONSHIP AS "relationShip", RELATIONSHIPERID AS "relationShiperId", TRAILDESC AS "trailDesc", TRAILTYPE AS "trailType", TRAILTIME AS "trailTime", LAT AS "lat", LON AS "lon" FROM MODI_R2CGL_FUGITIVE_RSER T where t.FUGITIVEID=#{fugitiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(t.inserttime,'yyyy-MM-dd')=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT M.FUGITIVEID, N.FUGITIVENAME, M.COUNT_V FROM (SELECT T.FUGITIVEID, COUNT(*) AS COUNT_V FROM MODI_R2CGL_FUGITIVE_RSER T WHERE to_char(t.inserttime,'yyyy-MM-dd')=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY T.FUGITIVEID ORDER BY COUNT_V DESC) M, MODI_R2CGL_FUGITIVE N WHERE M.FUGITIVEID = N.FUGITIVEID AND ROWNUM <= 20
mapper.update: UPDATE MODI_R2CGL_FUGITIVE t SET t.ISARCHIVED='1', t.ARCHIVEDREASON=#{archivedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},t.ARCHIVEDOPERTATORNO=#{archivedOpertatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE t.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
